name: NutritionWiki
0:
”Alexa, open nutrition wiki.”
”How much fat is in bologna?”
”I need to know about beef.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nutrition wiki
des:
This skill allows Alexa inform you about the nutritional content of any food. The goal is to allow users to be more informed about the food they are consuming without having to go and research every time they have a question.

News:

I am now partnered with a Registered Dietitian! This partnership will make sure that the quality of this skill is unmatched. As a medical professional she will have an overriding input on the production of the skill.

Please leave a review. I would sincerely appreciate any constructive criticism. I am wholeheartedly committed to making this skill a useful part of your day.

Software update:

1. you can now specify what type of nutritional content you want to know about. For example:
 -Carbohydrates
 -Energy ( in calories)
 -Protein, etc

Upcoming features:

1. The ability to choose a specific brand of food.

NOTICE: Although the skill is getting better every day as I pour my heart and soul into it, I still caution against using this as your source of truth should you have a medical need for exact nutritional content. If you need nutritional information due to a health issue, please do not depend on this skill just yet.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
